get_cheapest_blocks.name: Get Cheapest Blocks
get_cheapest_blocks.description: Find the cheapest quarter-hour or hourly price blocks for a delivery area and day. Returns a sorted list of blocks with their market prices per MWh and kWh.

area.name: Delivery Area
area.description: The delivery area code (e.g. NL, DK1, SE3). Must be configured in the integration.

resolution.name: Resolution
resolution.description: Price resolution to use — quarter-hour (15 min) or hourly (60 min).

n_blocks.name: Number of blocks
n_blocks.description: How many blocks to find. With quarter resolution: 4 blocks = 1 hour, 8 blocks = 2 hours.

contiguous.name: Contiguous
contiguous.description: When enabled, finds the cheapest consecutive window of n blocks. When disabled, finds the n individually cheapest blocks anywhere in the day.
